topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455bbff6368724158a40200#post_5455bbff6368724158a40200
[bq="mariomarc"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455bb2563687219fca00200#post_5455bb2563687219fca00200
as someone who is a fan and has read all of it

my question to all those answers is i don't know

and don't be so harsh man[/bq]
The reason why I'm being harsh is that homestuck fans are obnoxious cause they keep going, "let me tell you about homestuck" then post thousands of random images expecting for people to like it when non-fans have no context for it and thus don't understand what it is.

If someone would tell me something about why they like it then I would try it out, but posting random images going "why aren't these random images making you a fan already?" isn't going to get me to try it.

It's like when I asked Trashboat to explain what kamen rider was about and why he liked it and because he explained what it was about I thought it was interesting and actually do like it now and think it's a good franchise.  My problem with twisty and other homestuck fans is they smear thousands of images all over going, "be a fan already" and expect you to become a fan just by posting random images.  If I knew why people like homestuck then I would check it out.

1)What is homestuck about?
2)Why do you like it?
That's *ALL* I'm asking; I just want to know why people like homestuck cause if it sounds interesting I may check it out.  I wish twisty would stop shitting up the thread and actually explain why he likes homestuck.  If homestuck sounds interesting I will actually give it a chance.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455bd6663687260909b0100#post_5455bd6663687260909b0100
Two sides of the same coin.
Love is about knowing as much as you can about a person. Love is being in the same room and not needing a single word between you. It's about liking someone strengths and accepting their weakness. Love is confusing, chaotic, and a lot of time it doesn't make sense. Love is life's greatest and most beautiful mystery.

what is it about

i seriously don't know
i can't explain it

homestuck is just confusing
